WorkItem.Description:
I find whenever I get a quest reward Ring or Trinket which upgrades me, Rawr will double equip it. Sicne these items can only come from a quest, they should probably be set as only able for one to be used.
Â 
Would be good if Rawr would recognize the "Reward from <quest name here>" text as something that makes the item unable to be equipped in both slots at the same time, since tit's impossible to do.

Comments.Message: Working as intended. We cannot infer uniqueness from items being a quest reward. You can easily mark the item as Unique with just 3 clicks if you need to.
